## docker.ImageInfo.nameTag property

Docker image name and optional tag in the form `name` or `name:tag`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
nameTag?: string;
```

## Remarks

The image name is also known as "Repository" or "Repo".
